meta_title: MTBF Meaning: Definition, Formula, and Reliability Guide
meta_description: Mean Time Between Failures (MTBF) measures the average time between repairable asset failures. Understand how to calculate MTBF to improve reliability and ROI.
title: What Is MTBF? Mean Time Between Failures Definition
